text:
Heavy is the head that wears the crown...

Day 1 of the Nintendo Treehouse: Live | Nintendo Switch 2 continues: https://ninten.do/6011qS0Wz
DROP THE PRICE OR FACE BOYCOTT
$80 for a video game is tone deaf. Do the right thing Nintendo. We barely tolerated $70 for TOTK

I want to be as polite as possible here but if going from $60 to $80 for an item you buy once and play for 30+ hours is that big of a financial burden, you need to be looking for better work. You shouldn’t even look in the direction of a new game console if $20 is so vital.

Im going to leave this here

More games, lower prices
